data.title: The Boys season 4: When can you watch Episode 7 and finale, Episode 8 in US & UK
data.meta_description: As we near the climax of The Boys Season 4, the recent episodes have stunned fans with unexpected twists and revelations. With only two episodes left in this gripping season, anticipation is mounting for what's to come.
data.text:
Synopsis

As we near the climax of The Boys Season 4, the recent episodes have stunned fans with unexpected twists and revelations. With only two episodes left in this gripping season, anticipation is mounting for what's to come.

As we approach the climax of The Boys season 4, the latest episodes have left fans reeling with unexpected twists and revelations. With just two episodes remaining in this intense season, anticipation is high for what lies ahead, especially with the confirmation that the upcoming fifth season will be its final installment.

When Can You Watch Episode 7 of The Boys Season 4?

For viewers eager to know when the next installment, episode 7 titled "The Insider," will hit Prime Video, here's everything you need to know about the release schedule:

The initial three episodes of The Boys season 4 premiered simultaneously on Thursday, June 13th, 2024. Since then, the series has followed a weekly release pattern, a standard approach for Prime Video original shows. Episode 7 is set to debut on Thursday, July 11th, 2024, continuing the saga of The Boys and their ongoing battle against the supes, as mentioned in a report by Radio Times.

Also Read: Suspect Season 2: Release date, cast and what to expect

How Many Episodes Are There in The Boys Season 4?

Season 4 of The Boys consists of a total of eight episodes.

The Boys Season 4 Release Schedule: Upcoming Episodes

With the first six episodes already available for streaming, here's the full rundown of when you can expect future episodes to drop on Prime Video:

Episode 1 – "Department of Dirty Tricks" – June 13th, 2024 (available)

Episode 2 – "Life Among the Septics" – June 13th, 2024 (available)

Episode 3 – "We'll Keep the Red Flag Flying Here" – June 13th, 2024 (available)

Episode 4 – "Wisdom of the Ages" – June 20th, 2024 (available)

Episode 5 – "Beware the Jabberwock, My Son" – June 27th, 2024 (available)

Episode 6 – "Dirty Business" – July 4th, 2024 (available)

Episode 7 – "The Insider" – July 11th, 2024

Episode 8 – "Assassination Run" – July 18th, 2024

What Time Do New Episodes of The Boys Season 4 Release?

Prime Video typically drops new episodes, including The Boys, at 12am UTC (Universal Time Coordinated). As mentioned in the Radio Times report, for viewers in various time zones, this translates to:

UK Time: 1am

Pacific Time: 5pm (previous day)

Eastern Time: 8pm (previous day)

Europe Time: 2am

Plot Synopsis of The Boys Season 4

The current season explores a world on the brink, with Victoria Neuman inching closer to the Oval Office and Homelander tightening his grip on power. Amidst this chaos, Butcher faces personal challenges while grappling with leadership issues within The Boys. As tensions escalate, the team must unite against formidable odds to save the world from impending catastrophe.

FAQs:

Will The Boys season 5 be the last?

Eric Kripke, announcing on Twitter under the rebranded handle X during Season 4 Premiere Week, shared that Season 5 would be The Boys' final season.

Does Hughie love Annie?

Hughie confesses his enduring love for her. In issue #66, titled "The Bloody Doors Off," Annie departs New York, leaving Hughie behind amidst fallout from the attempted insurrection in Washington and his ongoing unease around her.
